title: Reformat Date
description: Given a date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD', reformat the date to 'DD Month YYYY', where 'Month' is the full name of the month. You need to convert the input date into this desired format.
input_format: A string date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
output_format: A string representing the date in the format 'DD Month YYYY'.
constraints: The input string is guaranteed to be a valid date.
The input date is always in the 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.
hints: Use a mapping for month numbers to month names.

title: First Missing Positive
description: Given an integer array nums, find the smallest missing positive integer. You must implement an algorithm that runs in O(n) time and uses constant extra space.
output_format: An integer representing the smallest missing positive integer.

examples.explanation: The smallest missing positive integer is 2, as 1 is present and 2 is the next positive integer.
1 and 2 are present in the array, so the next positive integer is 3.
All positive integers starting from 1 are missing, so the smallest is 1.

hints: Use a cyclic sort approach to place numbers in their correct positions.
Only consider positive integers in the range [1, n].
The first index that doesn't match the expected number will indicate the missing positive.
